section.name: Kerberos Services
section.p: The Directory Project consists a couple Kerberos related services.

td.p: A Kerberos 5 service provider plugin or in other words a key distribution center, based on RFC 1510 which stores its data within ApacheDS.
Change password is a protocol that uses Kerberos infrastructure to allow users to securely set new passwords. This ApacheDS provider implements the changepw protocol defined in RFC 3244.
